landing.bio: Hey there! I am currently a third year BCS/BBA Double Degree student offered jointly by the University of Waterloo and Wilfrid Laurier University. I am a pasionate and ambitious individual with 12+ months of Software development and business managment experience. When I'm not busy with schoolwork or working on projects you can probably find me playing sports or trying out a new food spot. I'm always up for a chat so feel free message me on Linkedin or shoot me an email!

experience.aboutWork: At The Weather Network I had the oppurtunity to work as a Software Developer intern on the Systems Architecture team. During my time I was able to develop a data conversion tool that converts weather data into comprehensible images. I also worked as part of a agile team developing a new consumer notification platform that notifies consumers of weather alerts.

At Cannect I was a Software Developer intern primarily working on their internal CRM. I built out new frontend compnents and features while also sqaushing any bugs experienced by our clients. In addition I was able to increase the performance of the platform by refactoring and modularizing some of the existing codebase.

As a camp counsellor at STEM camp I was able to share my passion for STEM with elementary-aged children. I taught and led discussion about various STEM topics while fostering a fun and safe learning environment. Hopefully I inspired the next generation of STEM students!

Working as a Student Developer for Evertz Microsystems was my first taste at coding in a professional environment. I got to learn software development best practices from talented engieners and was able contribute test scripts and utility programs

education.courses: Object-Oriented Software Development, Foundations of Sequential Programs, Algorithim Design & Data Abstraction, Statistics, Data Structures and Data Management
Finance I & II, Marketing I, Organizational Behaviour I & II, Building and Managing Products, Services & Brands
